{{Wad | name = Project 115 | author = Fabysk | iwad = Doom2 | status = Released | link = [http://project115.webs.com] }}
== Description == In the year 2050, step in the shoes of Robert Harris as you try and stop Group 935 from creating an undead army using an element called 115. As you travel even further, you find out that you were wrong. What experiment did Group 935 do?
== Downloadable Content == DLC's have been confirmed. There have been a total of 2 DLC's so far.
== Links == * http://project115.webs.com/
